experiment_number.description: Number associated with a specific run of the experiment

polarity.description: Ion polarity for the experimental run

description:
General experimental metadata describing one part of a study. It serves two purposes:
(1) to group files (e.g., RPLC fractions) containing data on one or more samples, and
(2) to document the individual sample-to-channel assignments for a multiplexed run.
On the PDC portal, we simplify this property's human-readable identifier (study_run_metadata_submitter_id) to 'Run Metadata Id'. Synonyms include plex name, plex dataset name, folder name, and more in labeled experiments.

links.label: Study Run Metadata references the Study that used the experimental design.
links.name: Study
